# The `LiveDebugValues.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/livedebugvalues">LiveDebugValues</a> pass extends the range of variable locations (specified by DBG&#95;VALUE instructions) from single blocks to successors and any other code locations where the variable location is valid. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/livedebugvalues">LiveDebugValues</a> pass extends the range of variable locations (specified by DBG&#95;VALUE instructions) from single blocks to successors and any other code locations where the variable location is valid.

There are currently two implementations: the &quot;VarLoc&quot; implementation explicitly tracks the location of a variable, while the &quot;InstrRef&quot; implementation tracks the values defined by instructions through locations.

This file implements neither; it merely registers the pass, allows the user to pick which implementation will be used to propagate variable locations.

<SectionDefinition>
